verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to you who destroy, <S%H7703><s%> but you weren't <S%H7703><s%> destroyed; and who betray, <S%H898><s%> but nobody betrayed <S%H898><s%> you! <S%H8552><s%> When you have finished destroying, <S%H7703><s%> you will be destroyed; <S%H7703><s%> and when you have made an end <S%H5239><s%> of betrayal, <S%H898><s%> you will be betrayed. <S%H898><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to us. <S%H6960><s%> We have waited for you. <S%H2220><s%> Be our strength every morning, <S%H1242><s%> our salvation <S%H3444><s%> also in the time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

At the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the thunder, <S%H1995><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> have fled. <S%H5074><s%> When you lift yourself up, <S%H7427><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> are scattered. <S%H5310><s%>
Your spoil <S%H7998><s%> will be gathered <S%H622><s%> as the caterpillar <S%H2625><s%> gathers. <S%H625><s%> Men will leap <S%H4944><s%> on it as locusts <S%H1357><s%> leap. <S%H8264><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is exalted, <S%H7682><s%> for he dwells <S%H7931><s%> on high. <S%H4791><s%> He has filled <S%H4390><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> with justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

There will be stability <S%H530><s%> in your times, <S%H6256><s%> abundance <S%H2633><s%> of salvation, <S%H3444><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and knowledge. <S%H1847><s%> The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is your treasure. <S%H214><s%>
Behold, <S%H691><s%> their valiant ones cry <S%H6817><s%> outside; <S%H2351><s%> the ambassadors <S%H4397><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> weep <S%H1058><s%> bitterly. <S%H4751><s%>

The highways <S%H4546><s%> are desolate. <S%H8074><s%> The traveling man <S%H5674><s%> ceases. <S%H7673><s%> The covenant <S%H1285><s%> is broken. <S%H6565><s%> He has despised <S%H3988><s%> the cities. <S%H5892><s%> He doesn't <S%H2803><s%> respect man. <S%H582><s%>

The land <S%H776><s%> mourns <S%H56><s%> and languishes. <S%H535><s%> Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> is confounded <S%H2659><s%> and withers away. <S%H7060><s%> Sharon <S%H8289><s%> is like a desert, <S%H6160><s%> and Bashan <S%H1316><s%> and Carmel <S%H3760><s%> are stripped bare. <S%H5287><s%>
"Now I will arise, <S%H6965><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> "Now I will lift myself up. <S%H5375><s%> Now I will be exalted. <S%H5375><s%>
You will conceive <S%H2029><s%> chaff. <S%H2842><s%> You will bring forth <S%H3205><s%> stubble. <S%H7179><s%> Your breath <S%H7307><s%> is a fire <S%H784><s%> that will devour you. <S%H398><s%>
The peoples <S%H5971><s%> will be like the burning of lime, <S%H7875><s%> like thorns <S%H6975><s%> that are cut down <S%H3683><s%> and burned <S%H3341><s%> in the fire. <S%H784><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> you who are far off, <S%H7350><s%> what I have done; <S%H6213><s%> and, <S%H7138><s%> you who are near, acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> my might. <S%H1369><s%>"

The sinners <S%H2400><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> are afraid. <S%H6342><s%> Trembling <S%H6342><s%> has seized <S%H270><s%> the godless <S%H2611><s%> ones. <S%H1481><s%> Who among us can live with the devouring <S%H398><s%> fire? <S%H784><s%> Who among us can live <S%H1481><s%> with everlasting <S%H5769><s%> burning? <S%H4168><s%>

He who walks <S%H1980><s%> righteously, <S%H6666><s%> and speaks <S%H1696><s%> blamelessly; <S%H4339><s%> He who despises <S%H3988><s%> the gain <S%H1215><s%> of oppressions, <S%H4642><s%> who gestures <S%H5287><s%> with his hands, <S%H3709><s%> refusing to take <S%H8551><s%> a bribe, <S%H7810><s%> who stops <S%H331><s%> his ears <S%H241><s%> from hearing <S%H8085><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> and shuts <S%H6105><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> from looking <S%H7200><s%> at evil <S%H7451><s%>â€”

he will dwell <S%H7931><s%> on high. <S%H4791><s%> His place of defense <S%H4869><s%> will be the fortress <S%H4679><s%> of rocks. <S%H5553><s%> His bread <S%H3899><s%> will be supplied. <S%H5414><s%> His waters <S%H4325><s%> will be sure. <S%H539><s%>
Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> will see <S%H2372><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> in his beauty. <S%H3308><s%> They will see <S%H7200><s%> a distant <S%H4801><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

Your heart <S%H3820><s%> will meditate <S%H1897><s%> on the terror. <S%H367><s%> Where is he who counted? <S%H5608><s%> Where is he who weighed? <S%H8254><s%> Where is he who counted <S%H5608><s%> the towers? <S%H4026><s%>

You will no longer see <S%H7200><s%> the fierce <S%H3267><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> of a deep <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> that you can't <S%H8085><s%> comprehend, with a strange <S%H3932><s%> language <S%H3956><s%> that you can't <S%H998><s%> understand.

Look <S%H2372><s%> at Zion, <S%H6726><s%> the city <S%H7151><s%> of our appointed festivals. <S%H4150><s%> Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> a quiet <S%H7600><s%> habitation, <S%H5116><s%> a tent <S%H168><s%> that won't <S%H6813><s%> be removed. Its stakes <S%H3489><s%> will never <S%H5331><s%> be plucked <S%H5265><s%> up, <S%H2256><s%> nor will any of its cords be broken. <S%H5423><s%>

But there Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be with us in majesty, <S%H117><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> of broad <S%H7342><s%> rivers <S%H5104><s%> and streams, <S%H2975><s%> in which no <S%H1077><s%> galley <S%H590><s%> with oars <S%H7885><s%> will go, <S%H3212><s%> neither will any gallant <S%H117><s%> ship <S%H6716><s%> pass by there. <S%H5674><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is our judge. <S%H8199><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is our lawgiver. <S%H2710><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is our king. <S%H4428><s%> He will save us. <S%H3467><s%>

Your rigging <S%H2256><s%> is untied. <S%H5203><s%> They couldn't <S%H2388><s%> strengthen the foot <S%H3653><s%> of their mast. <S%H8650><s%> They couldn't <S%H6566><s%> spread the sail. <S%H5251><s%> Then the prey <S%H5706><s%> of a great <S%H4766><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%> was divided. <S%H2505><s%> The lame <S%H6455><s%> took <S%H962><s%> the prey. <S%H957><s%>
The inhabitant <S%H7934><s%> won't <S%H559><s%> say, "I am sick. <S%H2470><s%>" The people <S%H5971><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein will be forgiven <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
